block.p: GOTTLIEB-Ilona. On March 31, 2002. Wife of the late Maximillian Gottlieb. Loving mother of George and Sandy Gottlieb and Paul and Sara Gottlieb. Dear sister of Trude Levine. Grandmother of Elizabeth and David Spivak, Stacey, Laura, Joshua, David and Lisa. In lieu of flowers, contributions may be made to New York University School of Medicine, c/o Dr. Martin L. Kahn Education Center, 560 First Avenue, NY, NY. Services Tuesday 12:45 PM at ''The Riverside'', 76 Street & Amsterdam Ave.
